item.description:
Qi Gong is an ancient form of healing exercise from China. The practice dates back thousands of years. We will practice simple exercises to move Chi. These exercises are specific to opening energy on the 12 energy meridians of our bodies. You will feel calm and relaxed but full of life force energy. All movements are from a standing upright position to allow for maximum Chi flow.

We will conclude the class with a sitting meditation focusing all of the energy that we have moved going through our Dantien or (lower energy center) and back into the earth.

Class will be held from 7:30-8:30. This class is for donation only. All donations will go to support the efforts in Haiti. No donation to small, No donation to large. Let's come together to support a nation in need.
item.name: Qi Gong class for Haiti
